title: Large Closets, Recreation Room, Rhino Security Deposit Option
posting_body: ["Once Ohio's largest high school, now one of Cleveland's most innovative apartment communities, The Brick Lofts at Historic West Tech High is a must see.", 'It is a beautiful building with exceptional architecture and construction qualities, unique loft-style apartment floor plans, and superior amenities.', 'Come experience the new stylish, and sophisticated look of the former West Tech High School.', 'Beautifully planned suites with a variety of 1, 2 & 3 bedroom apartment floor plans are available for you to call home.', 'You will find yourself living a lifestyle that fits your needs.', 'Constructed in 1912, the $32 million conversion of the West Tech High School into the West Tech Lofts in 2003- 2004, preserved the architecture, charm and character of the school; even the lockers adorn the corridors.', 'Superior and modern amenities in both the common areas and the private residences, compliment this one of a kind renovation.', 'Outstanding community amenities include garage parking, an exceptional fitness center, spacious game room, laundry center, and a community room created from the original high school auditorium, and off-street or garage parking.', "Just seconds from the I-90 freeway and just minutes from Downtown Cleveland, Lakewood, Ohio City and Tremont; The Brick Lofts at Historic West Tech High are centrally located in the heart of one of Cleveland's historic neighborhoods.", 'Let your home reflect your passion for design with a story.', 'See yourself in our Cudell Cleveland apartments.', '-Public Transportation', '-Rentable Garage', '-Ceiling Fan', '-Disposal', '-Rentable Surface Lot', '-Microwave', '-W/D Hookup', '-Flex Rent Payments', '-High Ceilings', '-Large Closets', '-BBQ/Picnic Area', '-Fitness Center', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'Monday: 9AM-6PM', 'Tuesday: 9AM-6PM', 'Wednesday: 9AM-6PM', 'Thursday: 9AM-6PM', 'Friday: 10AM-3PM', '2201 W. 93rd Street, Cleveland, OH 44102', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity.', 'Specials are based on availability and may expire or change at any time.', 'Specials and discounts may not be combined.', 'Rates are subject to change without advance notice.']
